duration.title: duration
duration.description: A time interval that represents the total time required to complete an activity.

description.en: A time interval that represents the total time required to complete an activity.

id.title: id
id.description: The Event or Entity identifier.  For an Event, the id MUST be a UUID expressed as a URN using the form urn:uuid:<UUID> per RFC 4122.  For Entities a valid IRI MUST be specified. The IRI MUST be unique and persistent. The IRI SHOULD also be dereferenceable, i.e., capable of returning a representation of the resource.  An Entity MAY be provisioned with a URI employing the URN scheme in cases where a Linked Data friendly HTTP URI is either unavailable or inappropriate.

description.en: The Event or Entity identifier.  For an Event, the id MUST be a UUID expressed as a URN using the form urn:uuid:<UUID> per RFC 4122.  For Entities a valid IRI MUST be specified. The IRI MUST be unique and persistent. The IRI SHOULD also be dereferenceable, i.e., capable of returning a representation of the resource.  An Entity MAY be provisioned with a URI employing the URN scheme in cases where a Linked Data friendly HTTP URI is either unavailable or inappropriate.

muted.title: muted
muted.description: An optional boolean value indicating whether or not the MediaObject has been muted .

description.en: An optional boolean value indicating whether or not the MediaObject has been muted .

version.title: version
version.description: A string value that designates the current form or version of the resource.

description.en: A string value that designates the current form or version of the resource.

volumeMax.title: volumeMax
volumeMax.description: A string value indicating the maximum volume level permitted.

description.en: A string value indicating the maximum volume level permitted.

volumeMin.title: volumeMin
volumeMin.description: A string value indicating the minimum volume level permitted.

description.en: A string value indicating the minimum volume level permitted.

alignedLearningObjective.title: alignedLearningObjective
alignedLearningObjective.description: An ordered collection of one or more LearningObjective entities that describe what a learner is expected to comprehend or accomplish after engaging with the resource.  Deprecated.  Use learningObjectives.

description.en: An ordered collection of one or more LearningObjective entities that describe what a learner is expected to comprehend or accomplish after engaging with the resource.  Deprecated.  Use learningObjectives.

creators.title: creators
creators.description: An ordered collection of Agent entities, typically of type Person, that are responsible for bringing resource into being

description.en: An ordered collection of Agent entities, typically of type Person, that are responsible for bringing resource into being

learningObjectives.title: learningObjectives
learningObjectives.description: An ordered collection of one or more LearningObjective entities that describe what a learner is expected to comprehend or accomplish after engaging with the resource.

description.en: An ordered collection of one or more LearningObjective entities that describe what a learner is expected to comprehend or accomplish after engaging with the resource.

datePublished.title: datePublished
datePublished.description: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that provides the publication date of a resource.

description.en: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that provides the publication date of a resource.

keywords.title: keywords
keywords.description: An ordered collection of one or more string values that represent tags or labels used to identify the resource.

description.en: An ordered collection of one or more string values that represent tags or labels used to identify the resource.

mediaType.title: mediaType
mediaType.description: A string value drawn from the list of IANA approved media types and subtypes that identifies the file format of a resource.

description.en: A string value drawn from the list of IANA approved media types and subtypes that identifies the file format of a resource.

objectType.title: objectType
objectType.description: A string value that designates the resource type.

description.en: A string value that designates the resource type.

dateCreated.title: dateCreated
dateCreated.description: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was created.

description.en: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was created.

dateModified.title: dateModified
dateModified.description: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was last changed or modified.

description.en: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was last changed or modified.

description.title: description
description.description: A brief, plain-text representation of the resource.

description.en: A brief, plain-text representation of the resource.

name.title: name
name.description: A string value comprising a word or phrase by which the resource is known.

description.en: A string value comprising a word or phrase by which the resource is known.

title: AudioObject
description: A Caliper AudioObject represents an audio or sound file.

description.en: A Caliper AudioObject represents an audio or sound file.
